name: suds
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also soapsuds) the mass of small bubbles that forms on the surface of water that has soap in it
Gary Ombler/Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
US a mass of small bubbles that forms on the surface of any liquid
/GettyImages
US old-fashioned informal for beer
